attributes.action: Accents protected under the Equality Act
attributes.additional_details: The Equality Act has protected millions of people from discrimination against themselves and accents being a key part of someone’s identity and something that people can easily discriminate against. It’s unclear why they aren’t already protected
attributes.background: Amend the 2010 Equality Act to introduce accents as a protected characteristic

rejection.details:
Add “accent” as a protected characteristic under Section 4 of the Equality Act

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/754258
